chapterall_Sign_OASISHOME_0.text:
If you wish to leave this Area use a Silver Bell.
You can craft them for free in the Crafting Menu.

chapterall_Sign_OASISHOME_1.text: One of the most important Feature for Free Roam is the Reverse Wall Jump.
To perform this technique you must first face away from the Wall. Then first jump and then move towards the wall. Now you can perform a walljump normaly.
Additionally it is possible to use Dropkick to perform one additionally Walljump against the oppposite of the first wall.

chapterall_Sign_OASISHOME_2.text: Performing only Dropkicks without getting hit increases the damage with each successful hit.
When you hit a Dropkick you gain one additionally Dropkick, this can repeated indefinitely.

chapterall_Sign_OASISHOME_3.text: Tornado Spin or 4th Melee can destroy Moneyblocks and Tornado Spin is unlocked when Dagger is aquired.
